metadata.Title: CVE-2012-3448 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Ganglia Web before 3.5.1 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary PHP code via unknown attack vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3448` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ganglia-monitor - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
ganglia-monitor-python - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
gmetad - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
libganglia1 - 3.6.0-1ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ganglia package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.6.0-1ubuntu2').
